files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
# EditorConfig is awesome: https://EditorConfig.org

# top-most EditorConfig file
root = true

# Unix-style newlines with a newline ending every file
[*]
end_of_line = lf
insert_final_newline = true

# Matches multiple files with brace expansion notation
# Set default charset
[*.{js,py}]
charset = utf-8

# Tab indentation (no size specified)
[Makefile]
indent_style = tab

# Indentation override for all JS under lib directory
[*.{js,ts}]
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2

# Matches the exact files either package.json or .travis.yml
[{package.json,.travis.yml}]
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2

files.name: .eslintrc.js
.gitignore
files.content:
.DS_Store
node_modules
/dist

# local env files
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Log files
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Editor directories and files
.idea
.vscode
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw*

#Electron-builder output
/dist_electron

files.name: README.md
files.content:
Gridea

A static blog writing client

[Download](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/releases) | [Homepage](https://gridea.dev/)
English | [Ğ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/blob/master/README-ru.md) | [ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/blob/master/README-zh_CN.md) | [ç¹é«”ä¸­æ–‡](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/blob/master/README-zh_TW.md) **[CHANGELOG](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)** ğŸ‘ Welcome to use **Gridea**ï¼ âœï¸ **Gridea** A static blog writing client. You can use it to record your life, mood, knowledge, notes and ideas... ## FeaturesğŸ‘‡ ğŸ“ Use the coolest **Markdown** editor to create quickly ğŸŒ‰ Insert pictures and article cover charts anywhere in the article ğŸ·ï¸ Label and group articles ğŸ“‹ Customize menus and even create external link menus ğŸ’» Use this client on **Windows** or **MacOS** or **Linux** ğŸŒ Use **Github Pages** or **Coding Pages** to show the world that more platforms will be supported in the future ğŸ’¬ Simply configure and access the [Gitalk](https://github.com/gitalk/gitalk) or [DisqusJS](https://github.com/SukkaW/DisqusJS) comment system ğŸ—ºï¸ Use **simplified Chinese**ã€**traditional Chinese**ã€ **English**ã€ **Russian**ã€ **French** ğŸŒ Use any default theme within the application or any third-party theme, free theme customization ğŸ–¥ Customize the source folder and synchronize multiple devices using OneDrive, iCloud, Dropbox, etc. ğŸŒ± Of course **Gridea** is still very young and has many shortcomings, but please believe it will keep moving forward ğŸƒ In the future, it will surely become your inseparable partner Give full play to your talentsï¼ ğŸ˜˜ Enjoy~ ## Development If you want to contribute code, please check the [Contribution Guide](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/wiki/%E8%B4%A1%E7%8C%AE%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97) in advance. ``` shell $ # Node version > v10.0.0 is requied $ git clone https://github.com/getgridea/gridea.git $ cd gridea $ yarn $ yarn electron:serve $ yarn electron:build ``` ## Contact [Telegram Channel](https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAEj82_lma0Y1wmyqUQ) | [Telegram Group](https://t.me/joinchat/IDY0ahRqb8NPodv95BNpBg) | QQ 1 Group: 970332209 | QQ 2 Group: 923131213 | Author Twitter: @EryouHao ## Example Screenshots
## Contributions We welcome all contributions. You can submit any ideas as [pull requests](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/pulls) or as GitHub [issues](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/issues). ## Donation
## License [MIT](https://github.com/getgridea/gridea/blob/master/LICENSE). Copyright (c) 2020-2023 EryouHao

files.content:
{
  "name": "gridea",
  "version": "0.9.3",
  "private": true,
  "description": "A static blog writing client. You can use it to record your life, mood, knowledge, notes and ideas...",
  "keywords": [
    "gridea",
    "static-site",
    "static-site-generator"
  ],
  "homepage": "https://gridea.dev",
  "license": "MIT",
  "author": {
    "name": "EryouHao",
    "email": "eryouhao@gmail.com"
  },
  "repository": "https://github.com/getgridea/gridea",
  "scripts": {
    "electron:build": "vue-cli-service electron:build",

    "shortid": "^2.2.14",
    "simple-get": "^4.0.1",
    "slug": "^0.9.3",
    "ssh2-sftp-client": "^4.2.4",
    "striptags": "^3.1.1",

    "url-join": "^4.0.1",
    "uuid": "^3.3.3",
    "v-emoji-picker": "^1.1.6",
    "vee-validate": "^3.1.3",
    "vue": "^2.6.10",
    "vue-class-component": "^6.0.0",
    "vue-i18n": "^8.7.0",
    "vue-property-decorator": "^7.3.0",
    "vue-router": "^3.0.1",
    "vue-shortkey": "^3.1.7",
    "vue2-transitions": "^0.2.3",
    "vuedraggable": "^2.23.2",
    "vuex": "^3.0.1",
    "vuex-class": "^0.3.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/bluebird": "^3.5.26",
    "@types/ejs": "^2.6.3",
    "@types/express": "^4.17.0",
    "@types/fs-extra": "^5.0.5",
    "@types/less": "^3.0.0",
    "@types/lowdb": "^1.0.7",

    "@types/normalize-path": "^3.0.0",

    "@types/shortid": "0.0.29",
    "@types/slug": "^0.9.1",
    "@types/ssh2-sftp-client": "^4.1.1",
    "@types/url-join": "^4.0.0",
    "@types/uuid": "^3.4.5",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-babel": "^3.6.0",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-eslint": "^3.6.0",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-typescript": "^3.6.0",
    "@vue/cli-service": "^3.6.0",
    "@vue/eslint-config-airbnb": "^4.0.0",
    "@vue/eslint-config-typescript": "^4.0.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.1",
    "babel-plugin-prismjs": "^1.0.2",
    "electron": "^7.3.3",
    "eslint": "^5.16.0",
    "eslint-plugin-vue": "^5.2.2",
    "husky": "^1.3.1",
    "less-loader": "^4.1.0",
    "lint-staged": "^8.1.5",
    "markdown-it-task-lists": "^2.1.1",
    "postcss-import": "^12.0.1",
    "tailwindcss": "^1.1.4",
    "typescript": "^3.0.0",
    "vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder": "2.0.0-beta.2",
    "vue-template-compiler": "^2.6.10"
  },
  "main": "background.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=10.0.0"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "lint-staged"
    }
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{js,ts,tsx,vue}": [
      "vue-cli-service lint",
      "git add"
    ]
  },
  "__npminstall_done": false
}

files.name: tsconfig.json
files.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "esnext",
    "module": "esnext",
    "strict": true,
    "jsx": "preserve",
    "importHelpers": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "allowJs": true,
    "types": [
      "webpack-env"
    ],
    "paths": {
      "@/*": [
        "src/*"
      ],
      "*": ["node_modules/*"]
    },
    "lib": [
      "esnext",
      "dom",
      "dom.iterable",
      "scripthost"
    ]
  },
  "include": [
    "src/**/*.ts",
    "src/**/*.tsx",
    "src/**/*.vue",
    "tests/**/*.ts",
    "tests/**/*.tsx"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "node_modules/gray-matter/gray-matter.d.ts"
  ]
}
